pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, July 31, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, July 31, 2016:

Vancouver, British Columbia

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Vancouver Pride Parade.

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • The Prime Ministerâ€™s route will begin at the corner of Thurlow Street and Robson Street
  • Media should arrive no later than 11: 30 am

Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations:

613-957-5555
